title: 學界-攬炒集會已經得到學者關注！

replies.msg:
睇嚟英美戰線將會係香港人以奇制勝嘅出路！


【#即時觀點】《孫子兵法．兵勢篇》日：「凡戰者，以正合，以奇勝。」反送中運動持續兩個月，本地抗爭與警察鎮壓爭持不下，北京不敢動用解放軍但亦不願讓步，戰局呈膠著。學界聯合攬炒巴團隊，在本地正面抗爭之餘；以民間外交之奇兵，開拓國際戰線，助攻《香港人權民主法》。這會否影響戰局？值得關注。
According to "The Art of War: Forces", In all fighting, the direct method may be used for joining battle, but indirect methods will be needed in order to secure victory. The anti-extradition movement has last for more than 2 months, local protests and police suppression are now in stalemate, also Beijing is retrained from deploying the PLA and refuses to make a concession. Now the student unions and the "Burn with Us" team have joined hands to extend the fight from local protests to citizen diplomacy, pushing forward the swift passage of the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act. Will it be a game changer? We should keep a close watch.
